original_text: And Jesus, when he came out, saw much people, and was moved with compassion toward them, because they were as sheep not having a shepherd: and he began to teach them many things.
korean_text: 예수께서 나오사 큰 무리를 보시고 그 목자 없는 양 같음으로 인하여 불쌍히 여기사 이에 여러 가지로 가르치시더라

sentences.original_text: And Jesus, when he came out
and was moved with compassion toward them
because they were as sheep not having a shepherd
sentences.korean_translation: 그들이 목자 없는 양과 같았기 때문이다

sentences.original_text: and he began to teach them many things
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 그들에게 많은 것들을 가르치기 시작하셨다
